prompts.title: Title
prompts.subTitle: Subtitle
prompts.createAnotherInbound: Do you want to add or edit another inbound?
prompts.existingFLPConfig: Have in mind that this project already has created FLP configuration. If you create another one, it will overwrite completely the current one

tooltips.inboundId: Choose the inbound ID that will be used to set the FLP tile configuration
tooltips.additionalParameters: Enter the value for the parameters in the Target Mappings section from the URL mentioned above

validators.inboundConfigKeyExists: An inbound configuration with the key: '{{inboundKey}}' is already defined.
validators.invalidParameterString: Parameter string is not a valid JSON object.
validators.duplicateInbound: Base application already has an inbound with the same `Semantic Object/Action/Title/Parameters`. Please change at least one of these attributes.
